short_summary: On November 1st 2022  The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit proposals for a reqiurement to procue four High Speed Cargo Towing Vehicles for delivery to Halifax, NS.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure four (4) High Speed Cargo Towing Vehicles for delivery to Halifax, NS. The requested delivery date is 200 days from contract award.

full_summary:
**High Speed Cargo Towing Vehicles Solicitation**
===============================================

**Supplier Information**
----------------------

* Solicitation number: W8476-236642/A
* Date of publication: November 1, 2022
* Closing date for tender: January 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Requirements**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of four (4) High Speed Cargo Towing Vehicles to be delivered to Halifax, NS. The required delivery date is 200 days from contract award.

**Security Requirements**
-----------------------

There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

**Language and Documents**
-------------------------

All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Potential Bidders**
-------------------

The following trade agreements have been designated as applicable to this solicitation:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact:

Brian James, Contract Authority
DND
101 Colonel By Dr
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

 Email: [brian.james3@forces.gc.ca](mailto:brian.james3@forces.gc.ca)

**Attachments**
--------------

The relevant documents for this solicitation are available at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/01/7b717eba40f4d5783cb936aae99a59c4/en_rfp_w8476-236642-a.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/5389e7c5ad04291103aa353fbd608043/en_w8476-236642-a_-_amndt_003.pdf
* https://canadabuys.can
